name: get_contacts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sms77io.
Tool description: Send SMS & text-to-speech messages, perform phone number lookups and much more via seven.io.
API description: Retrieves all contacts using the provided API key and returns the response in either JSON or CSV format.

json.description: Specifies whether to return the response in JSON format. If not provided, the response will be in CSV format.
